line_1: Bold Sacrilege laid hallow'd Buildings wast,
line_2: And in vile Heaps the sacred Rubbish cast.

line_1: Fair Italy, thy vine-clad vales to wast!
line_2: And all thy Parian seats of Attic art defac'd.
